attribs.name: repeating_npcreaction_-LOvxB2Ny2IorY9U7ijw_desc
attribs.current: When a creature the orc can see targets it with an attack, the orc chooses an undead under its command within 5 feet of it. The orc and the undead creature swap places, and the chosen undead becomes the target instead.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LOvzJ1zLaTv75rfFvr4_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You cause a creature's necrotic cyst to excruciatingly pulse and bloat. The target must make a Constitution saving throw or take 8d6 necrotic damage and be incapacitated until the end of your next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half damage and is not incapacitated.

A creature killed by this spell becomes a skulking cyst in 1d4 hours.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LOvzJ1zLaTv75rfFvr4_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: At Higher Levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot above 3rd.

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LOvzTqr7ABVHxZGMog1_atk_desc
attribs.current:
You cause a creature's necrotic cyst to excruciatingly pulse and bloat. The target must make a Constitution saving throw or take 8d6 necrotic damage and be incapacitated until the end of your next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half damage and is not incapacitated.

A creature killed by this spell becomes a skulking cyst in 1d4 hours.

At Higher Levels: At Higher Levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot above 3rd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-4_-LOw-2cSitKa2yWw1W9y_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You cause the necrotic cyst of a target to ooze fluid into the targets brain. It must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by you for the duration. If you or creatures that are friendly to you are fighting it, it has advantage on the saving throw.
While the creature is charmed, you have a telepathic link with is as long as the two of you are on the same plane of existence. You can use this telepathic link to issue commands to the creature while you are conscious (no action required), which it does its best to obey. You can specify a simple and general course of action, such as Attack that creature, Run over there, or Fetch that object. If the creature completes the order and doesn't receive further direction from you, it defends and preserves itself to the best of its ability.
You can use your action to take total and precise control of the target. Until the end of your next turn, the creature takes only the actions you choose, and doesn't do anything you don't allow it to do. During this time, you can also cause the creature to use a reaction, but this requires you to use your own reaction as well.
Each time the target takes damage, it makes a new Wisdom saving throw against the spell. If the saving throw succeeds, the spell ends.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-4_-LOw-2cSitKa2yWw1W9y_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a 5th-level spell slot, the duration is concentration, up to 10 minutes. When you use a 6th-level spell slot, the duration is concentration, up to 1 hour. When you use a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the duration is concentration, up to 8 hours.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-5_-LOw-S2mr1W56ak7IU62_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You heat a creature's necrotic cyst, causing it to burst through their skin, showering the area with burning necrotic pus and semisolid necrotic flesh. All creatures within a 20-foot-radius of the target (including the target) must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 8d8 necrotic damage. The target makes this save with disadvantage.

A creature killed by this spell becomes a skulking cyst in 1d4 hours.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-5_-LOw-S2mr1W56ak7IU62_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot above 5th.

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LOw-bPLMXbT-QbEbO68_atk_desc
attribs.current:
You heat a creature's necrotic cyst, causing it to burst through their skin, showering the area with burning necrotic pus and semisolid necrotic flesh. All creatures within a 20-foot-radius of the target (including the target) must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 8d8 necrotic damage. The target makes this save with disadvantage.

A creature killed by this spell becomes a skulking cyst in 1d4 hours.

At Higher Levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot above 5th.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-6_-LOw042RpHP4P8gOk7H3_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You magically manipulate a target's necrotic cyst, causing it to spasm and erupt, spewing a fountain of virulent necrotic tissue. The target makes a Constitution saving throw. The target takes 10d8 necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the save is successful, the target is no longer infected by a necrotic cyst.

All creatures within a 30-foot-radius of the target must make a Dexterity saving throw or be subject to the necrotic cyst spell.

A creature killed by this spell becomes a skulking cyst in 1d4 hours.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-6_-LOw042RpHP4P8gOk7H3_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot above 6th.

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LOw0H37BGmKZ8z4ew8C_atk_desc
attribs.current:
You magically manipulate a target's necrotic cyst, causing it to spasm and erupt, spewing a fountain of virulent necrotic tissue. The target makes a Constitution saving throw. The target takes 10d8 necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the save is successful, the target is no longer infected by a necrotic cyst.

All creatures within a 30-foot-radius of the target must make a Dexterity saving throw or be subject to the necrotic cyst spell.

A creature killed by this spell becomes a skulking cyst in 1d4 hours.

At Higher Levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot above 6th.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LOw3koBMizzpV4UbLqA_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You cause a target's necrotic cyst to swell slightly and seep necrotic fluid into their body. The target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take 1d6 necrotic damage.

This spells damage increases by 1d6 when you reach 5th level (2d6), 11th level (3d6), and 17th level (4d6).

A creature killed by this spell becomes a necrotic pustule in 1d4 hours.

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LOw3yWjPKUao5vOUo75_atk_desc
attribs.current:
You cause a target's necrotic cyst to swell slightly and seep necrotic fluid into their body. The target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take 1d6 necrotic damage.

This spells damage increases by 1d6 when you reach 5th level (2d6), 11th level (3d6), and 17th level (4d6).

A creature killed by this spell becomes a necrotic pustule in 1d4 hours.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-9_-LOw466yVveSk8upAD-O_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You attempt to cause a necrotic cyst to rapidly assault and mutate its owner's body. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. It takes 15d10 necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this spell becomes a behemoth cyst at the start of their next turn. Roll a d20. On a roll of 11 or higher, the behemoth is under your control. Otherwise, it is hostile towards all creatures.

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LOw4F4ZbwuwCzMtoTdR_atk_desc
attribs.current:
You attempt to cause a necrotic cyst to rapidly assault and mutate its owner's body. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. It takes 15d10 necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this spell becomes a behemoth cyst at the start of their next turn. Roll a d20. On a roll of 11 or higher, the behemoth is under your control. Otherwise, it is hostile towards all creatures.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LOw4NcTCTIsIV7tOWZZ_spelldescription
attribs.current:
For the duration, you know if there is a creature infected with a necrotic cyst within 30 feet of you, as well as where the creature is located.

The spell can penetrate most barriers, but it is blocked by 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of common metal, a thin sheet of lead, or 3 feet of wood or dirt.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LOw4dCTUJM3pySvX170_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: a piece of the "heart" of a skulking cyst worth 100 gp, which the spell consumes

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LOw4dCTUJM3pySvX170_spelldescription
attribs.current:
The target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or develop an internal sac that contains fluid or semisolid necrotic flesh.

The cyst may either be noticeable as a slight bulge or it may be buried deeply enough in the flesh of the creature that it is not immediately obvious. Whenever the creature takes necrotic damage or is hit by the unarmed attack of an undead creature, they take an extra 1d6 necrotic damage as the cyst convulses.

A creature who is aware they have a necrotic cyst can choose to have it removed by a skilled healer. This is a painful process which requires three successful DC 16 Medicine checks to complete. No more than one medicine check can be attempted in a 24 hour period. A failed Medicine check inflicts 9 (2d8) necrotic damage to the creature as necrotic fluid leaks into their body. A creature cannot perform this procedure on itself. A lesser restoration, greater restoration or wish spell can also remove the cyst.

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LOw4oZ54PyzoxQrLkMu_atk_desc
attribs.current:
The target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or develop an internal sac that contains fluid or semisolid necrotic flesh.

The cyst may either be noticeable as a slight bulge or it may be buried deeply enough in the flesh of the creature that it is not immediately obvious. Whenever the creature takes necrotic damage or is hit by the unarmed attack of an undead creature, they take an extra 1d6 necrotic damage as the cyst convulses.

A creature who is aware they have a necrotic cyst can choose to have it removed by a skilled healer. This is a painful process which requires three successful DC 16 Medicine checks to complete. No more than one medicine check can be attempted in a 24 hour period. A failed Medicine check inflicts 9 (2d8) necrotic damage to the creature as necrotic fluid leaks into their body. A creature cannot perform this procedure on itself. A lesser restoration, greater restoration or wish spell can also remove the cyst.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LOw4zyG-TIix8J1yXhh_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You can see and hear through the senses of a particular creature you choose that you know is infected with necrotic cyst and is on the same plane of existence. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw. On a successful save, the target isn't affected, and you can't use this spell against it again for 24 hours.

While using this spell, you are unaware of your own surroundings.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-8_-LOw5B-jwafhxkJlZF9c_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You attempt to cause a necrotic cyst to immediately spread through and overtake its owner's body. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. It takes 10d8+50 necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this spell becomes a behemoth cyst at the start of their next turn. You gain no special power over the creature, and it is free to act as the DM deems appropriate.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-8_-LOw5B-jwafhxkJlZF9c_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a 9th-level spell slot, the damage die increases to a d12.

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LOw5N-ZUGhbMD2j8VCh_atk_desc
attribs.current:
You attempt to cause a necrotic cyst to immediately spread through and overtake its owner's body. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. It takes 10d8+50 necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this spell becomes a behemoth cyst at the start of their next turn. You gain no special power over the creature, and it is free to act as the DM deems appropriate.

At Higher Levels: When you cast this spell using a 9th-level spell slot, the damage die increases to a d12.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-7_-LOw5YBGyEeckkEmCb4j_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You cause the necrotic cyst of a creature to spread into the creature's brain. The creature must make a Wisdom saving throw. The target is stunned for 10 minutes on a failed save, or 1 round on a successful one.

At the end of the creature's turn on a round where it has taken damage, it makes a new Wisdom saving throw against the spell. If the saving throw succeeds, this stunning effect ends.

If a target fails its saving throw, every 12 hours it must make a Constitution saving throw against the spell or gain a level of exhaustion. This effect ends when the creature's cyst is removed, or the target completes 48 hours of uninterrupted rest. A lesser restoration spell can also end this effect.

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LOw5ityZL6b1K3AmPrs_atk_desc
attribs.current:
You cause the necrotic cyst of a creature to spread into the creature's brain. The creature must make a Wisdom saving throw. The target is stunned for 10 minutes on a failed save, or 1 round on a successful one.

At the end of the creature's turn on a round where it has taken damage, it makes a new Wisdom saving throw against the spell. If the saving throw succeeds, this stunning effect ends.

If a target fails its saving throw, every 12 hours it must make a Constitution saving throw against the spell or gain a level of exhaustion. This effect ends when the creature's cyst is removed, or the target completes 48 hours of uninterrupted rest. A lesser restoration spell can also end this effect.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LOwoHgIADFZp1IOPTvm_desc
attribs.current: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed towards a hostile target it can see

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LOwoK4Pjt7CBI5-zzko_desc
attribs.current: For the purposes of spells and effects that target a creature's necrotic cyst, the orc is a valid target.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LOwoMJwRMTvLSGszFfa_desc
attribs.current: Any spell the orc casts that deals radiant damage deals necrotic damage instead.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LOwoOpyhkGcMm2PoCkF_desc
attribs.current: When the orc is reduced to 0 hit points, it begins to swell and expand. At the end of each of the orc's turns, its size increases by one category. When it reaches Gargantuan, it immediately bursts and is destroyed, and each creature within 60 feet of it must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 81 (18d8) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails the save is affected by the necrotic cyst spell.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LOwoQkqqa2t0ouSo43Q_desc
attribs.current:
The orc is a 18th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). The orc has the following cleric spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): cystic swelling, guidance, hand of radiance, sacred flame, toll the dead
1st level (4 slots): bane, inflict wounds, necrotic awareness, protection from evil and good
2nd level (3 slots): blindness/deafness, hold person, necrotic scrying
3rd level (3 slots): animate dead, bestow curse, necrotic bloat
4th level (3 slots): death ward, necrotic domination
5th level (3 slots): contagion, greater restoration, insect plague, necrotic burst, raise dead
6th level (1 slot): create undead, harm, necrotic eruption
7th level (1 slot): necrotic tumour
8th level (1 slot): necrotic termination
9th level (1 slot): necrotic abomination

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LOwoUjzqToyUWwTguLH_description
attribs.current: The orc makes three infectious touch attacks.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LOwoX2leai5vQ2GLDZA_description
attribs.current: On a hit the target is affected by the necrotic cyst spell.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LOwofOacnQZqzOSBZGM_description
attribs.current:
The orc spews forth a torrent of bloody necrotic bile in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails the save is affected by the necrotic cyst spell.

On the following turn, 2 (1d4) blood of Yurtrus form in random spaces within the area of the cone.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LOwor79RpQLWOTG7ipJ_spelldescription
attribs.current: You touch one willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one ability check of its choice. It can roll the die before or after making the ability check. The spell then ends.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LOwosZmEpaNVBOJ15dX_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You raise your hand, and burning radiance erupts from it. Each creature of your choice that you can see within 5 feet of you must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take 1d6 necrotic damage.

The spells damage increases by 1d6 when you reach 5th level (2d6), 11th level (3d6), and 17th level (4d6).

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LOwp6L7NiBjxdFzgU9s_atk_desc
attribs.current:
You raise your hand, and burning radiance erupts from it. Each creature of your choice that you can see within 5 feet of you must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take 1d6 necrotic damage.

The spells damage increases by 1d6 when you reach 5th level (2d6), 11th level (3d6), and 17th level (4d6).

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LOwpJeSQMnoLqmG5nwO_spelltarget
attribs.current: A creature that you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LOwpJeSQMnoLqmG5nwO_spelldescription
attribs.current:
Flame-like radiance descends on a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d8 radiant damage. The target gains no benefit from cover for this saving throw.
The spells damage increases by 1d8 when you reach 5th level (2d8), 11th level (3d8), and 17th level (4d8).

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LOwpWqbAPp9BAPSeOem_spelldescription
attribs.current:
A creature you can see must pass a Wisdom save or take necrotic damage. If it's missing any hit points, the damage die is 1d12; otherwise, it's 1d8.

The damage increases by one die when you reach 5th, 11th, and 17th level.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LOwptw7NGp1P8RWtcHV_spelltarget
attribs.current: Up to three creatures of your choice that you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LOwptw7NGp1P8RWtcHV_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LOwptw7NGp1P8RWtcHV_spelldescription
attribs.current: Up to three creatures of your choice that you can see within range must make Charisma saving throws. Whenever a target that fails this saving throw makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target must roll a d4 and subtract the number rolled from the attack roll or saving throw.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LOwpvVEwLwbThpPyqYX_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d10 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LOwpvVEwLwbThpPyqYX_spelldescription
attribs.current: Make a melee spell attack against a creature you can reach. On a hit, the target takes 3d10 necrotic damage.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LOwpzfMO2ukaLSurOIG_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: Holy water or powdered silver and iron, which the spell consumes

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LOwpzfMO2ukaLSurOIG_spelldescription
attribs.current: Until the spell ends, one willing creature you touch is protected against certain types of creatures: aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead. The protection grants several benefits. Creatures of those types have disadvantage on attack rolls against the target. The target also cant be charmed, frightened, or possessed by them. If the target is already charmed, frightened, or possessed by such a creature, the target has advantage on any new saving throw against the relevant effect.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LOwqUclcLYyQqythEhK_spelltarget
attribs.current: One creature that you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LOwqUclcLYyQqythEhK_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LOwqUclcLYyQqythEhK_spelldescription
attribs.current: You can blind or deafen a foe. Choose one creature that you can see within range to make a Constitution saving throw. If it fails, the target is either blinded or deafened (your choice) for the duration. At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the spell ends.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LOwqWUTrqIVvcWQKdID_spelltarget
attribs.current: A humanoid that you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LOwqWUTrqIVvcWQKdID_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: A small, straight piece of iron

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LOwqWUTrqIVvcWQKdID_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target on additional humanoid for each slot level above 2nd. The humanoids must be within 30 feet of each other when you target them.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LOwqWUTrqIVvcWQKdID_spelldescription
attribs.current: Choose a humanoid that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for the duration. At the end of each of its turns, the target can make another Wisdom saving throw. On a success, the spell ends on the target.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LOwqYz8xoI0lgYv8mI3_spelltarget
attribs.current: A pile of bones or a corpse of a Medium or Small humanoid within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LOwqYz8xoI0lgYv8mI3_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: A drop of blood, a piece of flesh, and a pinch of bone dust

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LOwqYz8xoI0lgYv8mI3_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, you animate or reassert control over two additional Undead creatures for each slot level above 3rd. Each of the creatures must come from a different corpse or pile of bones.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LOwqYz8xoI0lgYv8mI3_spelldescription
attribs.current: This spell creates an undead servant. Choose a pile of bones or a corpse of a Medium or Small humanoid within range. Your spell imbues the target with a foul mimicry of life, raising it as an undead creature. The target becomes a skeleton if you chose bones or a zombie if you chose a corpse (the DM has the creatures game statistics). On each of your turns, you can use a bonus action to mentally command any creature you made with this spell if the creature is within 60 feet of you (if you control multiple creatures, you can command any or all of them at the same time, issuing the same command to each one). You decide what action the creature will take and where it will move during its next turn, or you can issue a general command, such as to guard a particular chamber or corridor. If you issue no commands, the creature only defends itself against hostile creatures. Once given an order, the creature continues to follow it until its task is complete. The creature is under your control for 24 hours, after which it stops obeying any command youve given it. To maintain control of the creature for another 24 hours, you must cast this spell on the creature again before the current 24-hour period ends. This use of the spell reasserts your control over up to four creatures you have animated with this spell, rather than animating a new one.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LOwqZlbpFCm3zv14JNs_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: If you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the Duration is Concentration, up to 10 minutes. If you use a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the duration is 8 hours. If you use a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the duration is 24 hours. If you use a 9th level spell slot, the spell lasts until it is dispelled. Using a spell slot of 5th level or higher grants a duration that doesnt require concentration.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LOwqZlbpFCm3zv14JNs_spelldescription
attribs.current: You touch a creature, and that creature must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or become cursed for the duration of the spell. When you cast this spell, choose the nature of the curse from the following options: Choose one ability score. While cursed, the target has disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws made with that ability score. While cursed, the target has disadvantage on attack rolls against you. While cursed, the target must make a Wisdom saving throw at the start of each of its turns. If it fails, it wastes its action that turn doing nothing. While the target is cursed, your attacks and spells deal an extra 1d8 necrotic damage to the target. A remove curse spell ends this effect. At the DMs option, you may choose an alternative curse effect, but it should be no more powerful than those described above. The DM has final say on such a curses effect.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-4_-LOwqcn1c8ZyGF15a7uR_spelldescription
attribs.current: You touch a creature and grant it a measure of protection from death. The first time the target would drop to 0 hit points as a result of taking damage, the target instead drops to 1 hit point, and the spell ends. If the spell is still in effect when the target is subjected to an effect that would kill it instantaneously without dealing damage, that effect is instead negated against the target, and the spell ends.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-5_-LOwqgMMN-Z58WrDw7Ag_spelldescription
attribs.current: Your touch inflicts disease. Make a melee spell attack against a creature within your reach. On a hit, you afflict the creature with a disease of your choice from any of the ones described below. At the end of each of the targets turns, it must make a Constitution saving throw. After failing three of these saving throws, the diseases effects last for the duration, and the creature stops making these saves. After succeeding on three of these saving throws, the creature recovers from the disease, and the spell ends. Since this spell induces a natural disease in its target, any effect that removes a disease or otherwise ameliorates a diseases effects apply to it. Blinding Sickness. Pain grips the creatures mind, and its eyes turn milky white. The creature has disadvantage on Wisdom checks and Wisdom saving throws and is blinded. Filth Fever. A raging fever sweeps through the creatures body. The creature has disadvantage on Strength checks, Strength saving throws, and attack rolls that use Strength. Flesh Rot. The creatures flesh decays. The creature has disadvantage on Charisma checks and vulnerability to all damage. Mindfire. The creatures mind becomes feverish. The creature has disadvantage on Intelligence checks and Intelligence saving throws, and the creature behaves as if under the effects of the confusion spell during combat. Seizure. The creature is overcome with shaking. The creature has disadvantage on Dexterity checks, Dexterity saving throws, and attack rolls that use Dexterity. Slimy Doom. The creature begins to bleed uncontrollably. The creature has disadvantage on Constitution checks and Constitution saving throws. In addition, whenever the creature takes damage, it is stunned until the end of its next turn.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-5_-LOwqiqRemSs878FKXNZ_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: Diamond dust worth at least 100 gp, which the spell consumes

attribs.name: repeating_spell-5_-LOwqiqRemSs878FKXNZ_spelldescription
attribs.current: You imbue a creature you touch with positive energy to undo a debilitating effect. You can reduce the targets exhaustion level by one, or end one of the following effects on the target: One effect that charmed or petrified the target One curse, including the targets attunement to a cursed magic item Any reduction to one of the targets ability scores One effect reducing the targets hit point maximum

attribs.name: repeating_spell-5_-LOwqmtZsaZHCBDCzWTs_spelltarget
attribs.current: A 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point you choose within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-5_-LOwqmtZsaZHCBDCzWTs_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: A few grains of sugar, some kernels of grain, and a smear of fat

attribs.name: repeating_spell-5_-LOwqmtZsaZHCBDCzWTs_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d10 for each slot level above 5th.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-5_-LOwqmtZsaZHCBDCzWTs_spelldescription
attribs.current: Swarming, biting locusts fill a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point you choose within range. The sphere spreads around corners. The sphere remains for the duration, and its area is lightly obscured. The spheres area is difficult terrain. When the area appears, each creature in it must make a Constitution saving throw. A creature takes 4d10 piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature must also make this saving throw when it enters the spells area for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-5_-LOwqs9r6gWdDLoyD10X_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: A diamond worth at least 500 gp, which the spell consumes

attribs.name: repeating_spell-5_-LOwqs9r6gWdDLoyD10X_spelldescription
attribs.current: You return a dead creature you touch to life, provided that it has been dead no longer than 10 days. If the creatures soul is both willing and at liberty to rejoin the body, the creature returns to life with 1 hit point. This spell also neutralizes any poisons and cures nonmagical diseases that affected the creature at the time it died. This spell doesnt, however, remove magical diseases, curses, or similar effects; if these arent first removed prior to casting the spell, they take effect when the creature returns to life. The spell cant return an undead creature to life. This spell closes all mortal wounds, but it doesnt restore missing body parts. If the creature is lacking body parts or organs integral for its survivalits head, for instancethe spell automatically fails. Coming back from the dead is an ordeal. The target takes a 4 penalty to all attack rolls, saving throws, and ability checks. Every time the target finishes a long rest, the penalty is reduced by 1 until it disappears.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-6_-LOwqu3tGCbrWhGmH6i-_spelltarget
attribs.current: Up to three corpses of Medium or Small humanoids within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-6_-LOwqu3tGCbrWhGmH6i-_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: One clay pot filled with grave dirt, one clay pot filled with brackish water, and one 150 gp black onyx stone for each corpse

attribs.name: repeating_spell-6_-LOwqu3tGCbrWhGmH6i-_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a 7th-level spell slot, you can animate or reassert control over four Ghouls. When you cast this spell using an 8th-level spell slot, you can animate or reassert control over five Ghouls or two ghasts or wights. When you cast this spell using a 9th-level spell slot, you can animate or reassert control over six Ghouls, three ghasts or wights, or two mummies.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-6_-LOwqu3tGCbrWhGmH6i-_spelldescription
attribs.current: You can cast this spell only at night. Choose up to three corpses of Medium or Small humanoids within range. Each corpse becomes a ghoul under your control. (The DM has game statistics for these creatures.) As a bonus action on each of your turns, you can mentally command any creature you animated with this spell if the creature is within 120 feet of you (if you control multiple creatures, you can command any or all of them at the same time, issuing the same command to each one). You decide what action the creature will take and where it will move during its next turn, or you can issue a general command, such as to guard a particular chamber or corridor. If you issue no commands, the creature only defends itself against hostile creatures. Once given an order, the creature continues to follow it until its task is complete. The creature is under your control for 24 hours, after which it stops obeying any command you have given it. To maintain control of the creature for another 24 hours, you must cast this spell on the creature before the current 24-hour period ends. This use of the spell reasserts your control over up to three creatures you have animated with this spell, rather than animating new ones.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-6_-LOwqvuicDe17MJkooOV_spelltarget
attribs.current: A creature that you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-6_-LOwqvuicDe17MJkooOV_spelldescription
attribs.current: You unleash a virulent disease on a creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, it takes 14d6 necrotic damage, or half as much damage on a successful save. The damage cant reduce the targets hit points below 1. If the target fails the saving throw, its hit point maximum is reduced for 1 hour by an amount equal to the necrotic damage it took. Any effect that removes a disease allows a creatures hit point maximum to return to normal before that time passes.
